#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 day three : France , Denmark and Croatia wins three points ;
#Text=Argentina shares the spoils with debutants Iceland
#Text=Monday , June 18 , 2018

#Text=On Saturday , day three of the 2018 FIFA football World Cup , France defeated Australia 2 – 1 , Argentina drew 1 – 1 against World Cup debuts Iceland , Denmark defeated Peru 1 – 0 , and Croatia defeated Nigeria 2 – 0 .
#Text=Group C — France 2 – 1 Australia
#Text=In the first match of the day , the French side took on Australia at the Kazan Stadium .
#Text=France dominated in ball possession .
#Text=In the 33rd minute , Frenchman Lucas Hernández missed a chance from Ousmane Dembélé 's assist .
#Text=With both the sides having multiple attempts for scoring , the first half remained goalless .
#Text=In the second half , Australia 's Josh Risdon fouled on Anotine Griezmann in the penalty area .
#Text=After confirming with the video assistant referee , a penalty kick was awarded to France .
#Text=Griezmann scored from the spot kick , putting France in the lead .
#Text=However , the lead was short-lived , as Australia won a penalty kick about two minutes later due to Samuel Umtiti 's hand ball in the penalty area .
#Text=Mile Jedinak converted the spot kick into a goal , leveling it up for the Aussies .
#Text=Around the 80th minute , Aziz Behich scored an own goal , which was confirmed by the goal line technology .
#Text=Behich 's own goal proved to be the winning goal for the French side , winning three points .
#Text=After the match , Australia 's coach Bert van Marwijk said , " I am proud and disappointed .

#Text=During the last four World Cups we only once won an opening match so it is a good start today .
